content: the saturna is the perfect winter accessory keeping your ears warm while the braided cable adds a stylish touch this project will knit up in 1-2 hours depending on your knitting speed this is a great pattern if you ve ever wanted to try cables size one size 18-23″ difficulty beginner/intermediate you will need to know how to cast on knit stitch purl stitch cable and cast off please contact me if you have any questions i m more than happy to help the use of pattern/photos for resale purposes is prohibited however you are encouraged to sell the finished product please give credit to this pattern on all finished items by linking to roseandpurl com please link tag promote @roseandpurl or #roseandpurl #saturnaheadband please do not copy or share pattern details the pattern and photos are property of rose&purl and may not be altered or sold
